other_tests.findings: 4.5 x 3.6 cm gas and fluid containing collection anteromedial to the cecal base, with perforation of the appendiceal wall possibly visualized. An additional 6.8 x 4.2 cm fluid collection within the rectovesical pouch, new since prior.
